text: The Canton of L'Arbresle is a French administrative division, located in the Rhône department. The canton was established in 1790. Its boundaries are modified by decree of 27 February 2014 which came into force in March 2015. Décret n° 2014-267 du 27 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département du Rhône ==Composition == The canton of L'Arbresle is composed of 26 communes: {| class="wikitable centre" style="text-align:center;" !socpe="col"| Communes !scope="col"| Population (2012) |- |Bessenay |2,249 |- |Bibost |541 |- |Brullioles |797 |- |Brussieu |1,232 |- |Chambost-Longessaigne |886 |- |Chevinay |535 |- |Courzieu |1,117 |- |Éveux |1,265 |- |Fleurieux-sur-l'Arbresle |2,336 |- |Haute-Rivoire |1,396 |- |L'Arbresle |6,161 |- |Les Halles |473 |- |Longessaigne |600 |- |Montromant |437 |- |Montrottier |1,318 |- |Sain-Bel |2,271 |- |Saint-Clément-les-Places |616 |- |Sainte-Foy-l'Argentière |1,290 |- |Saint-Genis-l'Argentière |1,045 |- |Saint-Julien-sur-Bibost |556 |- |Saint-Laurent-de-Chamousset |1,922 |- |Saint-Pierre-la-Palud |2,607 |- |Savigny |1,963 |- |Sourcieux-les-Mines |1,963 |- |Souzy |760 |- |Villechenève |884 |} ==See also== *Cantons of the Rhône department *Communes of the Rhône department ==References== Category:Cantons of Rhône (department) Category:1790 establishments in France
title: Canton of L'Arbresle
